name: Towersplit
description:
Build the tower, match the colors, and beat your opponent!

Towersplit is a fun, competitive puzzle game. The gameplay is as simple as it is addictive: Just pick up a Cube and place it in the tower on your turn. Each Cube has two colors, and if you connect matching colors, you’ll score points. But be careful not to set your opponent up for an even bigger score on their turn!

Add some extra excitement by betting Coins before each game to win big and unlock new skins and themes!

Features:
- Addictive and easy-to-learn puzzle gameplay that puts your brainpower to the test!
- Earn rewards for your skills, including Coins from betting on each match.
- Loads of cool and colorful levels you can unlock, like the Forest, Sunset Mountain or the entire Universe!
- A wide variety of Cube styles to unlock and play with. Find the one that suits you the best!

Good luck, tower splitters!
